notes.details: This a note another note about my car. I love it

moreNotes.details: It has 5 wheels. 4 on the ground, 1 in the boot ;).
It's EMIs are killing me. But when I go for trips in it, seems like worth it. :)
Maximum upto 3 chapters. Then, I move onto another book.

notes.details: I hate to watch movies or series.
